Meta.Title: {{ name }} | {{ page }}
Meta.Keywords: Resume, Profile, Personal, Angular, React, Javascript, NativeScript, Typescript
Meta.Description: My Name is {{ name }} and I am a {{ designation }} {{ developer }}.

Description.One: I am a dedicated {{ designation }} {{ developer }} with my expertise in HTML5, SCSS, Javascript, Typescript, Angular and React. I enjoy designing and developing modern and responsive UX/UI designs that are intuitive and pleasing for the end-users. I really love to build apps from scratch and want to work in an organized team and environment.
Description.Two: I like to keep my code clean and well organized. I use indentation and add comments to each part of the code  to make it easy for me and the team to later understand the functionality with ease. Moreover, I try to keep a good folder structure of the app to maintain the overall quality of the project and make it easy to scale the app without any big hurdles and efforts.
Description.Three: Currently, I have started learning about Vue Framework and Vuex for state management library.

List.SCSS: SCSS Framework is developed for building responsive, fast, robust, and adaptable web apps.
List.HAM: An admin portal to manage hotel chains by providing features such as User Management, Message Broadcasting, Graphs/Reports and much more.
List.HGA: While on a stay in a hotel, guests can clean a room, send repair messages, view room key number and can do other important things in an instant.
List.HSA: Hotel staff can view guest repair messages, room clean status and other features of a customer without doing any physical effort.
List.SAC: A slack clone (minimal) that provides Firebase Auth Signup & Sign in, Real-time chatting on channels and an option to starred favorite channels.
List.IG: An Imgur based app that allows one to browse the Imgur gallery.
List.WF: A Weather App that shows the current weather and the 5-day forecast of the location users type in the search field.
List.CW: A simple and clean weather application that shows current weather data of a city.
List.RFP: A simple RSS Feed app that takes an XML format data and parses it to a JS object and shows it with the pagination.
List.TC: A single (CPU) and a multiplayer game challenge provided as a code challenge by Lieferando.
List.TODO: A todo application that covers all four aspects of a CRUD: Create, Read, Update, and Delete.
List.TTT: An interactive tic-tac-toe game that allows players to review a game’s history and see previous versions of a game’s board.
List.MIS: An image slider to handle the company's multiple websites from a central place that allows features such as language switch, drag, and drop of items and more.
